metadata.description: Azure VM deployment parameters. Customize this file for your project.
Short project name used for storage account naming (lowercase, no special chars)
Array of inbound port rules. Each rule needs: name, portRange (e.g., '80' or '6000-6007'), sourceAddressPrefixes (array of CIDRs or '*'), priority (1010+)
Linux user that will run the application service
Port range for display in deployment output (e.g., '8080' or '6000-6007')
